sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button>
    <slot></slot>
  </button>
</template>

<style scoped>
button {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #640032;
  font-size: 14px;
  height: 38px;
  padding: 8px 24px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 11px 0 rgb(37 44 97 / 15%),
    0 1px 3px 0 #64003270;
  transition: all 0.2s ease-out;
  }
  button:hover{
  background-color: #640032;
  border-color: #;
  color: white;
}
</style>
